block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across Connecticut this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the Connecticut Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to ctcivic@nytimes.com.
STATE OF CONNECTICUT
Hartford Connecticut Commission on Human Rights and Opportunities. Thursday at 2 p.m. 21 Grand Street. (860) 541-3400.
Hartford Underground Storage Tank Petroleum Clean-Up Account Review Board. Tuesday at 1:30 p.m. Connecticut Department of Environmental Protection Headquarters, 79 Elm Street. (860) 424-3370.
Hartford State Implementation Plan Revision Advisory Committee. Thursday at 9 a.m. Connecticut Department of Environmental Protection Headquarters, 79 Elm Street. (860) 424-3027.
Hartford State Elections Enforcement Commission. Wednesday at 9 a.m. 20 Trinity Street. (860) 566-1776.
Madison Siting Council hearing on an application to discharge waters. Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. Madison Town Campus, 8 Campus Drive. (860) 827-2935.
Manchester Siting Council public hearing on an application by Optasite Towers and Omnipoint Communications. Thursday at 3 p.m. Lincoln Center, 494 Main Street. (860) 827-2935.
New Britain Energy and telecommunications meeting. Tuesday at 1:30 p.m. Connecticut Siting Council, 10 Franklin Square. (860) 827-2935.
FAIRFIELD COUNTY
Bethel Building Committee for Bethel High School. Thursday at 7 p.m. Clifford J. Hurgin Municipal Center, 1 School Street. (203) 794-8501.
Danbury Commission on Persons With Disabilities. Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. Danbury City Hall, 155 Deer Hill Avenue. (203) 797-4500.
Darien Planning and Zoning Commission. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Darien Town Hall, 2 Renshaw Road. (203) 656-7300.
Darien Charter Revision Commission. Thursday at 11 a.m. Darien Town Hall, 2 Renshaw Road. (203) 656-7300.
Fairfield Solid Waste and Recycling Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Sullivan Independence Hall, 725 Old Post Road. (203) 266-3008.
Newtown Charter Revision Commission. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Newtown Town Hall South, 3 Main Street. (203) 426-6470.
Redding Connecticut Forest and Park Association. Tuesday at 6 p.m. Redding Town Hall, 100 Hill Road. (203) 938-2002.
Trumbull Board of Finance. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Trumbull Town Hall, 5866 Main Street. (203) 452-5000.
HARTFORD COUNTY
Manchester Citizens Network of the Capital Region forum. Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. Whiton Memorial Library, 100 North Main Street. peopleprosperityplace.org/forums or (860) 278-4090.
LITCHFIELD COUNTY
Barkhamsted Board of Selectmen. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Barkhamsted Town Hall, 67 Ripley Hill Road. (860) 379-8285.
Cornwall Planning and Zoning Commission. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Cornwall Town Hall, 26 Pine Street. (860) 672-2709.
New Milford Board of Assessment Appeals. Tuesday at 6 p.m. New Milford Town Hall, 10 Main Street. (860) 355-6020.
Plymouth Economic Development Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Plymouth Town Hall, 80 Main Street. (860) 585-4001.
Salisbury Conservation Commission. Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. Salisbury Town Hall, 27 Main Street. (860) 435-5182.
Woodbury Board of Selectmen. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Shove Building, 281 Main Street South. (203) 263-2144.
MIDDLESEX COUNTY
Chester Economic Development Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Chester Town Hall, 203 Middlesex Avenue. (860) 526-0013.
Essex Water Pollution Control Authority. Monday at 7 p.m. Essex Town Hall, 29 West Avenue. (860) 767-4340.
NEW HAVEN COUNTY
Madison Economic Development Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Madison Town Campus, 8 Campus Drive. (203) 245-5672.
Woodbridge Town Plan and Zoning Commission. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Town Hall, 11 Meeting House Lane. (203) 389-3400.
NEW LONDON COUNTY
Montville Town Administration Subcommittee of the Town Council. Monday at 6 p.m. Montville Town Hall, 310 Norwich-New London Turnpike. (860) 848-3030, ext. 311.
Stonington Zoning Board of Appeals. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Stonington Police Station, South Broad Street. (860) 535-5060.
TOLLAND COUNTY
Andover Board of Education. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Andover Elementary School, 35 School Road. (860) 742-7305.
Tolland Town Council budget meeting. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Hicks Memorial Municipal Building, 21 Tolland Green. (860) 871-3600.
Tolland Tolland Water Commission. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hicks Memorial Municipal Building, 21 Tolland Green. (860) 871-3600.
WINDHAM COUNTY
Ashford Board of Finance. Thursday at 7 p.m. Ashford Town Office Building, 5 Town Hall Road. (860) 487-4401.
Killingly Special Town Council budget review. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Killingly Town Hall, 172 Main Street. (860) 779-5300.
